name: Madam President: She’s My Boss
summary: As the school's self-proclaimed bounty hunter, you tend to cause more problems than you actually solve. But after standing up to the principal, you catch the eye of the beautiful student council president, who immediately recruits you as her hired muscle. With the help of her sweet secretary and, surprisingly, your worst enemy, it's time to embark on a mission to rectify the school's problems—starting with the principal himself! Can you save the campus from utter chaos while winning the hearts of these three gorgeous girls?
